aboutMe.title: Who is Aleksandra Spadlo?
aboutMe.subTitle:
A highly motivated, hardworking and positive person, interested on multiple aspects of Creative Design, from Artworks, Fashion Drawings, Logos till Websites and Applications UI/UX. Enjoying paper drawing, digital painting, wireframes, creating colourful prototypes, exploring new design tools and always learning/improving new things everyday.

Graduate in Fashion Designer, from KSA Cracov, where shows you that "Fashion is more than just clothes and Art is more than just paint".

Feel free to take a look at my works, the portfolio contains two sections: Web/App UI Design/Prototypes and Art Design. Enjoy it!

cards.cardDescrip: The challenge of developing these projects and all the knowledge I got from the work is what I like most about working as a UX / UI Designer. Aligning business expectations with user-centered design to create better experiences and achieve goals and conversions through user testing, ideation, wireframes, prototyping, and UI design.

Art is my safe haven, where I flee in the sad days and also in the happy days to expose my inspirations. From the point of origin comes the idea, a scribble on paper, digitization and the end product. Each process is pure magic and it feels like I'm not at work, but in an intellectual therapy to develop creativity and to be happy with myself.

mainWorks.descritpion: Projects related to responsive UI websites, applying UX best practices, with extreme attention to accessibility. Company design and branding, corporate identity and style guides, build, design and maintain company designs. Expand my projects to absorb my work.

allWorks.wNdescription:
Interactive House is guidance application on planning permission and building control for householders.
The first version of the application was made with Adobe Flash using a nice 3D house animation. With the new era of mobile devices and deprecation of Adobe Flash in the common Browsers the project was migrate to React with a poorly 2D SVG version, however the new version is currently with server instability and they request a new version where the instability would be solved and they could bring back the 3D Animation.

My work was redesign the whole webpage, bringing a better User Experience, create a new 3D representation and work accord with the Brand Visual Identity from TerraQuest applications. They have as guidelines Bootstrap framework and Font Awesome as iconography.

Flash versions:

Click in the links below and enable flash to check the OLDs Flash websites :)

Terraced House  |  Detached House

Currently live version:

As the first application was built in a third company, TerraQuest unfortunately didn't have the main 3D files, only the finals SWF files what became impossible to recreating the house with a good resolution, the best solution was recreate from the beggining and we had a really interesting idea. Why not have fun while create something complex? Yes, we had permission to build the house using The Sims 4, we had to request permission to EA Games and all the project was delivered in the design perspective, currently on code development and integration with the assets that I provided.

You can take a look in a really basic part from one of my Scratching using The Sims house:

The Sponsors got very excited with the new version and very anxious to deploy the application. On the prototype I am using the old Flash file as mp4 to emulating the idea.

Live prototype here

Also in the following sections below you can see a representation from the Prototype.

collorPallete.description: The web standards color palette is a finite set of colors approved for use on Interactive House project and consists of only 6 background colors: planning-blue-10, planning-blue-20, planning-red-10, planning-white-100, planning-gray-10, planning-black-100. These web standards color palette can be applied only in background elements and for other elements you can use any bootstrap color available on the Bootstrap documentation.

typoGraphy.description:
Effective text treatment can help developers create pages with character and style using attributes such as size, color and weight.
Unique font-family in the whole project: Open Sans, sans-serif with 100 of font-weight to get a lighter visualization.
The default font size is 1rem. All elements, including headings (H1-6) are set to the default font size. To size any paragraph or heading element to be larger or smaller than the default font size, you must add a size class.
The standard size classes that can be used on any text element are: plan-title-h1, plan-subtitle-h2, plan-subtitle-h3, plan-subtitle-h4, plan-subtitle-h5, plan-subtitle-h6. For example, <h1 class="plan-subtitle-h3"> reduces the H1 text to 1.75rem.
As this project is aligned together with Bootstrap any Display classes can be used to increase the font-size.

mainWorks.descritpion: Projects related to experimental Applications, applying the best practices of UX, with extreme attention to accessibility. Discovering new tools and working with various prototype methods to create a perfect look for the customer to understand the true intention of the final product. Expand it to check my projects.
